item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)

1.Ghālibum [..]yāb bin Dawsum [of the lineage of Qāśimum has embanked and ploughed and terraced and planted with crops and set in order all of his valleys and his terraced fields] 2.of Shabʿān and Lagiʾum and Sāriʿ [and Yāfiʿ and all of their wells and their structures and their water channels and their buildings. And he has terraced and planted with] 3.crops and harvested in his valley of Dhū-Rabaḍa[t and his tenant farmland, in particular 8000 bql-units for himself and his children and his dependents,] 4.[at the command and direction of ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʿAmm Dhū-Dawānum and Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir , and with the aid of his goddess of protection, and with the aid and resour-] 5.[ces of the clients of Qāśimum--the entire tribe of Marḥaḍū and Mashraqiyyatān. And Ghālibum entrusted these inscriptions to ʿAthtar Shā-] 6.[riqān and ʿAmm and Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir against anyone who might damage or deface or tamper with or destroy or remove (them) from their place.]

Ghālibum ..yāb bin Dawsum
of Shabʿān and Lagiʾum and Sāriʿ
crops and harvested in his valley of Dhū-Rabaḍ
Restored full text of the inscription:
Ghālibum ..yāb bin Dawsum of the lineage of Qāśimum has embanked and ploughed and terraced and planted with crops and set in order all of his valleys and his terraced fields
of Shabʿān and Lagiʾum and Sāriʿ and Yāfiʿ and all of their wells and their structures and their water channels and their buildings. And he has terraced and planted with
crops and harvested in his valley of Dhū-Rabaḍat and his tenant farmland, in particular
bql-units for himself and his children and his dependents,
at the command and direction of ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʿAmm Dhū-Dawānum and Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir , and with the aid of his goddess of protection, and with the aid and resour-
ces of the clients of Qāśimum--the entire tribe of Marḥaḍū and Mashraqiyyatān. And Ghālibum entrusted these inscriptions to ʿAthtar Shā-
riqān and ʿAmm and Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir against anyone who might damage or deface or tamper with or destroy or remove them from their place.
